name: FURRY HITLER 2
description:
Delve into the mysterious atmosphere of 1940s Germany in the visual novel Furry Hitler 2. You'll immerse yourself in a flurry of events surrounding Adolf Hitler, who travels to a small town near Munich to personally check on military affairs.

As the player, you assume the role of the Fuhrer, exploring different locations and encountering diverse characters. Along the way, you'll face awkward situations and interact with the fascist ideals of the time.

However, not everything is as simple as it seems. A world of secrets and intrigue exists among high-ranking officers and soldiers, which can determine your fate. The unexpected awaits you at every turn – from encounters with mysterious women who don't mind spending time with the Fuhrer to crucial decisions that impact the entire course of history.

Step into a world of darker shades of history where love and intrigue are intertwined with adult content, making each intense section a discovery of new aspects in this captivating visual novel.


Features:
  • Incendiary Story:
    Imagine yourself in an exciting world of intrigue and passion where every choice you make matters. Delve into a gripping story that will stay with you for a long time.

  • Many Sexual Situations:
    Explore a plethora of explicit scenes with different characters. Discover a variety of erotic moments that tell their own unique story.

  • Mini-Games:
    Feel the adrenaline and have fun with various mini-games that add diversity and enjoyment to the main story.

  • Real-Time 3D Graphics and Animations:
    Enjoy high-quality 3D character models and dynamic animations that emphasize the realism and emotion of the game.

  • Lots of Nude Scenes with Different Girls:
    Immerse yourself in the world of luxurious relationships with numerous characters, each ready to make the game even more interesting.

  • One-Handed Play: ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
    Simple controls allow you to enjoy the game easily and comfortably, even with busy hands.
